name: Promodex
description:
Promodex digital agency for 7 years of operation in Ukraine has established itself as a reliable business partner for businesses from a wide range of industries.
We do Web development, Web Design, PPC, SEO, SMM, UI/UX to connect businesses with the target audience, increase loyalty and brand awareness.
We specialize in development successful of individual accounting CRM/ERP systems.
 
Technologies
We are always watching over trends in design and technologies. We create interactive prototypes with the help of Axure; develop front-end side using HTML5, CSS3, JS, Gulp; create layouts in Photoshop and Figma; use CMS OpenCart and Wordpress; develop complicated and heavy-loaded projects with the help of Laravel framework.
 
Principles
The most important thing for us is the quality of work. We pay the most attention to design, working with text and content, as well as to creating the right impression the customers would have from visiting the site.
We occupy top positions in the ratings of web studios in Ukraine:
